div.head: 損動胎氣
div.div: fetus qi excited by an injury

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: fetus qi excited by an injury

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shang tai 傷胎 , harmed fetus. Pu ji fang 普濟方 344 ：治妊娠損動胎 氣，腹內結痛 , “To cure fetus qi excited by an injury during pregnancy, with intraabdominal nodes and pain”. Sun shang 損傷 , injury ; injured [33]
① Pathological Condition identical with shang sun 傷損 . Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 1: 損傷之病，亦以眾矣 , “There are many diseases of injury ”.

② Pathological Mechanism of physically harming or impairing functions of the organs of the human body. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 4: 腎肝損傷，故因嘔逆唾血也 , “ Injured kidneys and liver cause vomiting with counterflow, and blood spitting”.
